p: This plant has been tested in cryopreserved and refrigerated (5 °C) bull semen [ 42]. The extract concentration employed was 200 µg/mL. Positive effects were observed in both cryopreserved and refrigerated sperm samples. More specifically, this plant extract enhanced sperm motility, viability, and acrosome and membrane integrity. There was also a reduction in the percentage of abnormal sperm in the cryopreserved samples.
